sense.gloss: to differ (from), to be different, to be distinct, to be unlike, to vary, to disagree (with)
to be wrong, to be incorrect, to be mistaken
to become abnormal, to go wrong
improper conduct (e.g. between man and woman), indiscretion
violation, offense, offence, breach, transgression, infringement, contravention
uncomfortable feeling, feeling out of place, sense of discomfort
to make a mistake (in), to commit an error (e.g. in calculation)
to confuse, to mistake something for something else
difference, disagreement, conflict, clash, discrepancy, inconsistency
to make a mistake, to be incorrect, to be mistaken
out-of-place, inappropriate, sticking out like a sore thumb
misunderstanding, misapprehension, misconception, false impression, wrong idea
crossing without meeting (e.g. letters in the post, people on the road), going astray
difference of opinion, misunderstanding, estrangement, disagreement
to hardly recognise, to mistake for something or someone else
to not match well (e.g. at the seams), to not mesh properly (of gears)
to differ (e.g. of opinions), to clash, to be in conflict (e.g. with the facts), to run counter (to), to be inconsistent (with), to be contradictory
improper conduct (e.g. between man and woman), indiscretion
to change (into something out of the ordinary)
missing (meeting) each other, failing to meet
to pass (by) each other, to brush past
to miss (meeting) each other, to fail to meet
to be at odds, to clash, to be in conflict
an order of magnitude higher, off by a digit, in a different league, unbelievable, incomparable, unimaginable

sdata.j: ↑長↑↓なが↓い↑目↑↓め↓で↑見↑↓み↓れば↑違↑↓ちが↓ってくると↑思↑↓おも↓います。
sdata.e: I suppose it's different when you think about it over the long term.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓が↑最後↑↓さいご↓に↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑伝↑↓つた↓えた↑人↑↓ひと↓は、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓を↑気違↑↓きちが↓いだと↑思↑↓おも↓ったようだ。
sdata.e: The last person I told my idea to thought I was nuts.

sdata.j: ↑大抵↑↓たいてい↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓を↑気違↑↓きちが↓いだと↑思↑↓おも↓っている。
sdata.e: Most people think I'm crazy.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑違↑↓ちが↓います。あなたです。
sdata.e: No I'm not; you are!

sdata.j: なぜみんなが↑私↑↓わたし↓のことを↑気違↑↓きちが↓いだと↑思↑↓おも↓うのか、↑遂↑↓つい↓に↑説明↑↓せつめい↓してくれてありがとう。
sdata.e: Thanks for having explained to me at last why people take me for an idiot.

sdata.j: ↑違↑↓ちが↓うよ、↑新↑↓あたら↓しい↑彼↑↓かれ↓じゃない。
sdata.e: No, he's not my new boyfriend.

sdata.j: もし↑間違↑↓まちが↓いを↑見↑↓み↓つけたら↑訂正↑↓ていせい↓してください。
sdata.e: If you see a mistake, then please correct it.

sdata.j: もし↑間違↑↓まちが↓いがありましたら、↑訂正↑↓ていせい↓をお↑願↑↓ねが↓いします。
sdata.e: If you see a mistake, then please correct it.

sdata.j: ↑理論↑↓りろん↓↑上↑↓じょう↓、↑理論↑↓りろん↓と↑実行↑↓じっこう↓の↑間↑↓あいだ↓には↑何↑↓なん↓の↑違↑↓ちが↓いもないが、↑実際↑↓じっさい↓↑上↑↓じょう↓↑違↑↓ちが↓いはあるものだ。
sdata.e: In theory, there is no difference between theory and practice. But, in practice, there is.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑違↑↓ちが↓う↑鍵↑↓かぎ↓を↑取↑↓と↓った。
sdata.e: You took the wrong key.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑必↑↓かなら↓ずしも↑間違↑↓まちが↓ってはいない。
sdata.e: You are not at all wrong.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓がわざとその↑間違↑↓まちが↓いをしたと↑思↑↓おも↓うかい。
sdata.e: Do you think he made that mistake on purpose?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑馬鹿↑↓ばか↓に↑違↑↓ちが↓いない。
sdata.e: You must be a fool.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑朝寝坊↑↓あさねぼう↓に↑違↑↓ちが↓いない。
sdata.e: You must be a late riser.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑計算↑↓けいさん↓を↑間違↑↓まちが↓えているよ。
sdata.e: You're off in your reckoning.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑間違↑↓まちが↓っていると↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I think that you're wrong.

sdata.j: あなたは↑間違↑↓まちが↓っているとおもうのですが。
sdata.e: I think that you're wrong.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑何↑↓なん↓↑度↑↓ど↓も↑同↑↓おな↓じ↑間違↑↓まちが↓いをし↑続↑↓つづ↓けている。
sdata.e: You continue making the same mistakes time after time.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はまったく↑同↑↓おな↓じ↑間違↑↓まちが↓いをまたやったね。
sdata.e: You have made the very same mistake again.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はばかげた↑間違↑↓まちが↓いをしたようだね。
sdata.e: It appears that you have made a foolish mistake.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はそんな↑間違↑↓まちが↓いをくり↑返↑↓がえ↓さない↑方↑↓ほう↓がよい。
sdata.e: You had better not repeat such an error.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はしょっちゅう↑間違↑↓まちが↓いをしている。
sdata.e: You're forever making mistakes.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はジェーンを↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑妹↑↓いもうと↓と↑間違↑↓まちが↓えたのかもしれない。
sdata.e: You may have mistaken Jane for his sister.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はあんな↑長↑↓なが↓い↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓の↑後↑↓のち↓で↑疲↑↓つか↓れているに↑違↑↓ちが↓いない。
sdata.e: You must be tired after such a long trip.

sdata.j: そんなに↑長↑↓なが↓い↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓の↑後↑↓のち↓で↑疲↑↓つか↓れているに↑違↑↓ちが↓いない。
sdata.e: You must be tired after such a long trip.

sdata.j: あなたはそんなに↑長↑↓なが↓い↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓の↑後↑↓のち↓で↑疲↑↓つか↓れているに↑違↑↓ちが↓いない。
sdata.e: You must be tired after such a long trip.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は、↑故意↑↓こい↓に↑間違↑↓まちが↓いを↑犯↑↓おか↓したんだね。
sdata.e: You made the mistake on purpose, didn't you?

sdata.j: わざと↑間違↑↓まちが↓えたんでしょ。
sdata.e: You made the mistake on purpose, didn't you?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑理論↑↓りろん↓が↑間違↑↓まちが↓っていると↑言↑↓い↓いたいのではない。
sdata.e: I don't mean to challenge your theory.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑答↑↓こた↓えは↑間違↑↓まちが↓っている。
sdata.e: Your answer is wrong.
